headline: Ariel Investments Ariel Global Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Ariel Global Fund traded -3.66% lower in the quarter, lagging the -0.99% return posted by the MSCI ACWI Index, but ahead of the -4.71% decline of the MSCI ACWI Value Index.
